meta.job_title: Manager, ITS (Website and Internal Applications Development and Support)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing and supporting strategic website and internal web applications
Overseeing the modernization of web applications as the company moves into the Azure cloud
Technical management and oversight for application development and support activities
Supporting content management and digital experience related software platforms and web analytics
Supporting HRIS team with human capital management software solutions and their integration with other systems
Managing the development of the overall strategic direction, technical architecture, and roadmap for the application development area
Participating in the development of architecture standards and software development processes
Evaluating opportunities to leverage third party resources to participate or to augment the software development processes

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information systems, or related field (Master's preferred)
